jobDescription: Robert Half Finance and Accounting is actively seeking a full-time Business Analytics Manager in Glendale. The responsibilities of the Business Analytics Manager include the managing of the team and controlling and developing information sources for business analysis. Strategic planning and insight presentations/recommendations to the management, implementing and overseeing analytical approaches and methodologies as well as other duties as assigned.  Are you looking for the next chapter of your career? If so, please respond with a copy of your most current resume to monika.koenig@roberthalf.com. If you are already working with a recruiter from Robert Half, please contact them directly regarding job number (00490-0010506382).
